CARC.BA.summary: Carboclor S.A. provides integrated logistics services. The company operates port terminals. Its services also include taxation platform service for trucks and containers; reception, storage, and dispatch of chemical, agro-industrial, and fuel products by lines, trucks, barges, and ships; drum fractionation, logistics warehouse storage, and delivery; blending of controlled products; special requirements, such as heating in tanks and lines; inerting, and blanketing of tanks and cisterns; spill prevention; final disposition of slop and waste treatment with certification; and boat service cranes. In addition, the company operates a laboratory to provide physical-chemical analysis of solvents, alcohols, ketones, liquefied petroleum gas, and other derived products. Carboclor S.A. was founded in 1968 and is based in Campana, Argentina.
